reviewText: If you like Unit One series you can catch up on missed episodes

saving the last episode of Season 2 BECAUSE we LOVE it so so so much!  Very well put together, characters
are so believable ----great writing and great series!!!

I enjoy the heck out of this Danish police drama. The writing is fresh and interesting, with the lives of the main characters as important to the overall story arc as each of the crimes that are solved. The acting --both main characters and single episode characters -- is quite believable and engaging.
Entertaining and well done.  I enjoyed Season 1 and it is always a pleasure when following seasons meet up with expectations.
